channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Network Data Loss Prevention
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Network Data Loss Prevention

item.title: CVE-2017-3933|2024-09-17T03:22:22.381Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Embedding Script (XSS) in HTTP Headers vulnerability in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote authenticated users to view confidential information via a cross site request forgery attack.
